values:
1. Are you tired of me already?
2. Are you tired of us?
3. Are you tired of trying to make me understand that we are just not meant to be?
4. Are you tired of trying?
5. Are you tired of fighting, fighting for your heart?
6. God, why the abnormality in me?

Oh hai, looks like I am back in this space but no no, I guess before LJ or anyother LJ communities kick me out in their community because of the long no-updates-this-livejournal-is-pronounced-dead... I should just type something.

I had migraine this afternoon like after eons of not having one, it came back with vengeance. Thankfully, it wasn't a bad one.

I took the meds, oh, Doc gave me anarex - same old medicine which till now hasn't brought any cure to the incessant major epicbitch headache I have been having for the last 100 years. Yes, if you still don't know, I am past a century years old. He also gave me some lozenges for my sore throat which have seemed to numb my tastebuds. How nice.

Anyways, my point of writing in here is for the other half to read this message I am leaving for her.

Here it goes,

Hey you,

After you called, life seems so much better. Like I have always said, you are the cure to all my heartaches and I was so glad to hear your voice even in my most sodding sedated tired state. Though I was in pain and it was raining the whole time and I wished you were by my side, I think I am still very thankful for your call. So thank you. :) 

Ickle asked me today what I am thankful for, I am thankful for a heart that is still beating, loving you and forgiving people who did wrong to me and a heart that still holds you inside.

I was listening to my iTunes and this song came - If It Kills Me by Jason Mraz. Pretty much sums up what really is inside this heart.
 


Hello, tell me you know
That you've figured me out
Something gave it away
And it would be such a beautiful moment
To see the look on your face
To know that I know that you know now

And baby that's a case of my wishful thinking
You know nothing
'Cause you and I, we go carrying on for hours on and
We get along much better than you and your boyfriend

Well all I really want to do is love you
A kind much closer than friends use
But I still cant say it after all we've been through
And all I really want from you is to feel me
As the feeling inside keeps building
And I will find a way to you if it kills me,
If it kills me

How long can I go on like this
Wishing to kiss you
Before I rightly explode
And this double life I lead isn't healthy for me
In fact it makes me nervous
If I get caught I could be risking it all
Maybe theres a lot that I miss
In case I'm wrong

All I really want to do is love you
A kind much closer than friends use
But I still cant say it after all we've been through
And all I really want from you is to feel me
As the feeling inside keeps building
And I will find a way to you if it kills me,
If it kills me

If I should be so bold
I'd ask you to hold my heart in your hand
Tell you from the start how I've longed to be your man
But I never said a word I guess I'm gonna miss my chance again

Well all I really want to do is love you
A kind much closer than friends use
But I still can't say it after all we've been through
And all I really want from you is to feel me
As the feeling inside keeps building
And I will find a way to you if it kills me,
If it kills me

I think it might kill me

And all I really want from you is to feel me
As the feeling inside keeps building
And I will find a way to you if it kills me,
If it kills me

It might kill me.

I know you still read this space so here goes.


I don't know, but I believe,
That some things are meant to be,
And that you'll make a better me,
Everyday I love you.

I never thought that dreams came true,
But you showed me that they do,
You know that I learn something new,
Everyday I love you.

'Cos I believe that destiny (ooooooh),
Is out of our control (don't you know that I do),
And you'll never live until you love,
With all your heart and soul.

It's a touch when I feel bad (ooooooh),
It's a smile when I get mad (ooooooh),
All the little things I am,
Everyday I love you oooh, oooh, aaah.

Everyday I love you boy, Everyday I love you.
'Cos I believe that destiny (ooooooh),
Is out of our control (don't you know that I do),

And you'll never live until you love,
With all your heart and soul.

If I asked would you say yes?
Together we're the very best.

I know that I am truly blessed, Everyday I love you.

And I'll give you my best, Everyday I love you. Oh. . . .


Blessed day and week ahead for you.

As this sudden surge of really bad emotions running through my head and body and here I am trying to counter them by drinking coke in the morning, this song came to my head.

 

I guess this is how it feels like knowing the end is coming.

"And we know it's never simple,
Never easy.
Never a clean break, noone here to save me.
You're the only thing I know like the back of my hand,
And I can't,
Breathe,
Without you,
But I have to,
Breathe,
Without you,
But I have to. "
- Breathe, Taylor Swift

-

Taken at Bugis MRT station whilst on the way to meet half for our date earlier today.
 
When I saw this, I just knew it was worth taking a shot and uploading to my Facebook and a mention in my space. Now, let's see this poster. Oh, by the way, this was taken from the movie poster which stars Anne Hathaway and Jake Gyllenhaal - Love and Other Drugs. I bet by now, you do realise that I took only a portion of the poster and focused on the quote which was plastered on it right? 

Heh.

Those words there, they strike some chord in me although I must admit that when I first saw it, I couldn't help but to snigger and thought to myself - how cheesy can this get? Hahaha! But, as I mull over it and thought it through, I kinda concluded that it is one of the many cheesy truths about life and love too.

It is such a familiar quote yes? Many couples would have probably came across this like at least once in their life - falling in love with someone they least expect to and then realise that they need the other party rather than just wanting them.

If you ask me, I sure have my fair share of it. And looking at me and my half's love story, it is definitely the epitome of our love story.

Never thought I would have given her my heart or even fell so deeply in love with such an amazing person and eventually, became the one person I need the most. It is amusing yet to me it is heartwarming - to be in love with someone I least expected to and then realising, she is the one I need in my life, the same person who completes me and my life.

In other news, I am looking forward to watch the movie when it opens at the box office next year which is also in a few days time which then leads me to the next somewhat related news...

I am in deep trouble aren't I? 

I should be bracing up for the worst as 2011 approaches and yet, I am falling deep... so into deep.

So yes, the above quotes are horribly mad cheesy but let's face it, it is also one of the many corny truths about life and love. ;)

What say you?

It was a crazy Christmas, believe me.

Lots of running and eating, being merry, joymaking, gifts exchanging and a whole lot of getting together.

It was a mad decision but all worth it, to fly back home and spend Christmas together with my other half - this was a 50-50 plan which may or may not work out. Hell, I take risks in life and this was one of the risk I took which I will never regret.

Got back home at 4 in the afternoon and my oh my, the weather was so fine (yes, this was before the whole storm that reigned the dark night skies which obviously then illuminated the usual black skies).

Decided to ring the other half to check where she was and only to find out she already had plans for the evening. Oh, what a bummer, there goes my Santarina surprise.

Well, Santarina still have to deliver the presents right on time right even if the weather was horribly crazy with the pouring rain and lightning storm everywhere like as if the mighty powers above were having some war and fighting it all out using their awesomeshit light sabers. Yes, so in the end, with the help of the efficient MRT, Santarina decided to not risk her reindeers from being struck down by lightnings and took the train instead.

She arrived at her half's place thankfully dry and rather flustered and irritated by the stupid humid Singapore's rain bring along without fail like every Goddarn time it pours. Half was very surprised to see Santarina it seems. Perhaps, she was amused by the fact that I still look good or bothered to dress up and equipped with my Santarina hat despite the crazy weather and how late it was.

Well, I was greeted with a pleasant surprise. Smooth jazzy tunes was playing in the background, lights were dimmed only with candles illuminating my half's madly gorgeous place and ahhh, what is Christmas without the Christmas tree right? There it was, standing colourfully with the red, blue, green, golden lights wrapping its delicate leaves.

My oh my, I was obviously slowly floating up, up and away by what was in front of me.

A sweet candle lit dinner. /heaven

We settled down, placed my coat aside and sat down. We ate, we drank to our heart's content, we reminisced, we enjoyed each other's company and totally basked in each other's presence.

Came gift exchanging time for the both of us and I surprised her with the diary she has been wishing for and coupled with a sweet Christmas card, written a heartfelt note too plus a box of Royce' delish Champagne flavoured chocolate. She was bemused because she got me the same thing too - the chocolate from Royce part that is. Heee. :p Inside the bag of gift she had for me was a pair of earrings and necklace which she told me to choose. I decided on the earrings because they were just so dainty and elegant. :)

We retreated to another space of her house where the real surprise began. I was looking around and she pointed to a parcel wrapped in a candy like in pink and white. Cute, I must say. I was instructed to take it and have a look. Lol. It didn't make sense cos' obviously, it was hers since it was in her space but she 'forced' me to open it for her. Weird, I know. So, I took the honour of unwrapping 'her' present and only to find out that the parcel was FROM her and addressed TO her. Fishy. Very, weird and fishy.

So, I unwrapped the present and unboxed what was inside. My heart stopped when I saw the packaging. I gulped and paused for a second to carefully inspect the white packaging. OMG. IT WAS AN APPLE BOX AND IT SCREAMED ITOUCH AT MEEEEE. Omg. This is going to sound stupid but I honestly thought she got an iTouch 4 for Christmas and I was so dead envious. HAHAHAHAH. (well, it was on my wishlist :P)

So, I unboxed it and to my pleasant horror suprise, there was an engraving at the back and it had my name on it!

Now, that was when it all hit me... the iTouch WAS FOR ME.

OMGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGG. MY HALF GOT ME THE ITOUCH4 WHICH I HAVE BEEN EYEING ON FOR SOOO LIKE 45678906545MILLIONYEARS LONG. /runs around the house.

I was so elated no no, the right word should be euphoric. It was like all the good chemicals in my body just increased like a million fold. I was so happy. Yeah, mad endorphins reproduction on Christmas.

Gahhh, I love my dear half. <3

Heee. Yes, I am incredibly happy that my wish came true and it was my half who granted it but honestly, what made my Christmas was the fact that the both of us got to be near each other for Christmas this year even though it was a short one. Truth to be told, nothing beats spending Christmas with your dearly beloved ones right?

So, thank you, my half, my heart. :)

p/s: We named it Stefan, yes... because I loveeee Stefan Salvatore from Vampire Diaries. :p

Nothing hurts more than saying goodbye to someone whom you would like to spend every single moment with and yet not being able to do so due to constraints.


I just want you to know that all I want for Christmas is you, my the other half.

Merry Christmas.

xxx
Adorra.

As the night beckons and the moon shining oh so bright, I hereby conclude what a terrible Tuesday it has been for me.

I was in pain almost everywhere and I mean like literally.

My head throbbed.
My right arm acted up again.
My knee begin to have short sharp pain.
There were times where my chest had sudden pains.
And of course, the heart?
Well, today, it sure felt like it was ripped and torn apart over and over again.

Torn heart still struggling to grapple and accept the fact that it will all be over soon. 31st December is fast approaching and I am helplessly trying to save whatever I can save. What did I got myself into again? I am horribly upset and I have been trying to hide it but I can't help it when it shows. It gets miserable sometimes trying to keep up with the act that everything is fine when nothing is. You think I am enjoying putting a fake front in front of you all the time and when you accidentally push the wrong button and I start getting all pissy and emotional?

Well, you are probably not having it any easier as well.

Oh what the fuck.

Take the gains and forget the losses you say, think of the happy moments and etc. But, what if the loss is too much to take till it is so overwhelming, it drowns the happy moments away?

Sigh.

Done here lamenting and wallowing in sorrow which eventually will multiply in the days to come.

Night for now.

I am feeling akwardly emotional with sudden crying involved upon seeing quotes from tumblr.

time to head to bed.

Hi all,

It has been a while. :)

I have been good, very much alive and in fact, feeling very lazy. It is the 'nua' period where the holiday mood sinks in and yours truly is just too downright lazy to do anything. I mean, really anything.

Well, spreading some good love is excluded. *winks

Just the other night, my half asked me what do I want for Christmas? I think she has been asking me the same question like a million times now and I still could not give a definitive answer. Partly because I have tonnes of tech gadgets which honestly cost a bomb like in total or even just one and and what I really want for Christmas... well... I think it is just impossible and unattainable even if I have been really good this year. *Santa, please take cue from me to nod with that statement.*

Yes, truth to be told is that I just want my other half to be with me for as long as this life takes me or rather, us.

Is that too much to ask for?

I guess it is because the odds are against us (me) and such wish is just too hard to be granted. *sobs

Well, since I have not posted my Christmas list for this year and if any of you are still cracking your brains on what to get me... here are some of the things you can get me. Pardon the price (well, just ignore some for they are just a part of my VERY wishful thinking).

1. iTouch 4 8GB
2. Moleskine (red) Daily planner /Sheila, you got it all covered for this right? HAHAHAHA!
3. Kate Spade Sutton Place bagS
4. Macbook Pro
5. Adobe Creative Suite (although, I think no. 4 would need to be in first before I can get this)
6. Grey's Anatomy, Skins UK, Private Practice DVD sets from HMV
7. Kindle with Amazon account or giftcard so I can buy the ebooks!
8. Silver/Red Swatch
9. Topshop/Dorothy Perkins/ Newlook gift vouchers
10. My other half <3 (:
11. Nikon D700 with 18-200mm lens and 50mm lens!
12. Nikon FE SLR
13. No harm wishing I guess for this... may my other half stay longer and not go away when the new year arrives.

Till then, back to the festive cheers!

While battling with unsettled and raging emotions from tolerating a bunch of annoying youths acting stupid in the train, disturbing my for-once-peaceful train ride home and and on top of that, figuring out why the heart was aching so badly - both physically and metaphorically well, having said that, let's just take it as literally... I was spacing out, drfiting in and out of reality with 1001 things running in my head.

And while all of that was happening, little did I know that my face began to turn red and so did my eyes. Then came the tears welling up, filling up the red eyes of mine. Initially, I attributed it to dust or lack of sleep I have been getting these days but obviously, it was a result of something else. Perhaps, something more deeper than that.

I was freaking out inside knowing that I was still outside, still in the view of public, strangers I have never met or spoke to before and there I was heading for some breakdown. I kept looking up to make the tears run back inside to where it was supposed to be until I reach home. I was greeted with white almost blinding lights which hurt my eyes even more after minutes of staring at it. My head seemed to have its own conversation going on inside. It was weird when I could hear myself talking (or rather, the head) with the music blasting away from my phone.

The word control popped too many a times. It made me ponder for a while if I am actually losing control of my life or was there even a time that I was totally in full control of my life. And if I was, why does it feel that I am beginning to lose control of my life at even the slightest things like my emotions and in this case, tears. Have I totally gone soft from growing up after being hit by countless and not to mention endless of heartbreaks and shit life brings? Why did the tears kept clogging my eyes and made me feel like I was on the right path to a massive breakdown?

So many questions yet it was always replied with a painful uncertain silence.

The heart still hurts like it was pierced through with a knife and then got ripped apart. I guess, at the end of the day, nothing kills more than just words.


But, on a hindsight, I should be thankful or feel relieved that perhaps in this life, we are just meant to be friends (and with that, we are not putting each other in a state where we are comitting a sin) and nothing more than that and you are accepting it  well. And, it is about time that I should come to terms with it.

Sigh.

Another night, another battle to sleep, another lonely aching heart, another night of crying to sleep.

Guten nacht.

Drop everything now
Meet me in the pouring rain
Kiss me on the sidewalk
Take away the pain

:)

Let me walk you to the insides of my haywired head. Haywired from all the medications that I have been consuming for the past 21 years of my life. Hahahaha!

You. ASOS. Burberry. Skinnypizza. Churros, plenty of Churros. Spinning out of control like way out of control in a car. You. Snow. Sunsets. Mani/Pedi. ITouch4. Nights of Grey's Anatomy and Skins. Leaving my head and heart at the dancefloor. My Chemical Romance. Moleskine planner/notebook. Macbookpro. Christmas parties. You. Bali. Newlook. Korean bbq. Muse's Unintended. PC Tools. Christmas shopping. Birthday dinners. Partying. Kings of Leon's Someone Like You. Yeah, YOU again. Love. Bungy jumping. Marche. NYNY. Rapunzel. The Tourist. Bugis Street. Nandos. Kate Spade. THAT Agnes B bag. Triple banded rings. HP GSB. You. Starbuck's Dark Cherry Mocha. Gloria Jean's Chocoloco. MOS Annual 2011. Santorini. Nikon SLR. Lomoshoot out. You.

I am bored, horribly bored. :(

1. How time is ticking very fast and just as I know it, weekends are over.
2. From point no. 1, we are moving to 2011.
3. Continuation from point no. 2, it will all be over when the clock strikes 12 on 1 January 2011.
4. Well, I foresee even before that, it will all come tumbling down, disintegrate and self destruct like say maybe after 15th December.
5. Not being a pessimist but you tell me and you probably agree with me because it will and more so when awful reminders like "remember... new year, new life, new whatever other shit that comes along with it" appears every now and them, coming from you even when I give you warnings not to do it.
6. And of course, the situation that I am in - why do this heart always go for someone who is
- unreachable/unattainable
- wrong yet feels so right like you know coming home after getting lost
- asdfghjkl
7. How I always wake up feeling like shit in the morning because I still can't get over the feeling of being reminded that I am supposed to love you less and of course, it will all be over soon.
8. Noise in the house.

/urgh
fuck this shit.
fml.
/end of rant.

which eventually made her to be perfect for and to me. :)

Be the greatest one, the last in my heart and the heart can ever love in this life.

Weather is horribly good and I mean really good. It is so sunny and bright. I really could make do with a date out with clownie and spend time with her. Too bad, clownie has things on today. :(

Weather is perfect for a lomoshoot out, cycling by the beach, picnic under the canopy of trees in East Coast and well, just strolling down the not so pretty white sand of East Coast beach. Instead, I am in bed having to put up with mum's incessant mindless lord knows what ramblings and rantings and followed by a hot debate on families between her and dad.

/urghhh.

fuck this shit.

I was bawling to this earlier before I decided to retire for a quick nap before heading off to the new office.


Damn shit this stupid imbalanced hormones and terrible schwingy mood swings. :(

"I could use somebody.... someone like you."

To you know who,

I will reiterate this to you.

Answering to your question in the bus earlier before you left,

you: heh, you still care?

Of course I do and I will always do.

Even at my worst or best, pms or normal day, or you drive me nuts or even my early grave or break my heart into million pieces (with mentions of goodbyes and those things you very well know that I hate to hear), I still care for you and will still care for you. This is because I love you and nothing will change that. Take heart in that and remember this well.

Love,
Me.

Let's face it, every girl will know of this monthly bleeding period of our little fragile lives which for some mad reasons affect our hormones and emotions. I find it perplexing how come such bleeding or cleaning the dirty blood in our body can have like 234567890 other repercussions. Imbalanced hormones and schwingschwing moodswings to name a few.

Terrible week and horribbad date night. Le sigh. :(
(but thanks bb for just tahan-ing me with the sudden "I don't knows" and  "really bad mad quiet awkward moments like especially at dinner")

I foresee wanting to watch a sad movie once Friday ends despite Moe Moe wanting me to watch Secret Garden over the weekends. Ha. We shall see how. But, for now, I will just keep a mental note of the sad movies I have been dying to watch.

P/S: Azy posted Tiger Lily by Matchbook Romance. How apt, so apt. Seeesh, falling apart, disintegrating and self destructkkk in 5, 4, 3, 2, 1.

I burst out in tears with Taylor singing at the back and after that phone call. Oh, make me heartless please. Make me less empathetic, less sympathetic, emotionless, just heartless. Maybe, things will get better once I am less of these and that.

See, love brings you up all the way to heaven and reality brings you either back to earth or all the way down to hell (which at times, love is capable of doing also but that, I would attribute to failed love - le sigh).

I had the longest sleep ever for the week and woke up tragically not feeling like P.Diddy but with a sodding bad backache and mixed haywired emotions. Let me see what caused such occurence especially on a hot and fine Sunday late morning. Jeez. I shall not even point out the obvious.

I had a museum date for the longest time also yesterday. I went to National Museum to catch Pompeii exhibition courtesy of V who shared with me some invites and then off to Peranakan Museum for the Nth time to go back to my roots and relish in the fact that I have an awesome kickass culture. Hahaha. Yea, I am proud of my origins like that. It was a good date in all. 

Started with a drink from Starbucks (cues you to say HELLO DARK CHERRY MOCHA WOOHWEEHH!) then in between was all time favourite Marigold's Neapolitan ice cream in a cup. You know like the good ol' young and innocent days where Neapolitan ice cream in a cup was a hit amongst parents because it is worth every penny in the pocket. Three awesome flavours in a cup and for a dollar or was it lesser? What more can you ask for? Then followed by dinner at Bakerzin at Suntec. I think I haven't dine at the outlet for like many many moons already because they had a change in their menu and I was caught clueless not knowing what to order or do next. Well, thank God for the awesome manager then. Ha! We ended the date with a trip to Haagen Dazs and had a try at their Christmas menu. Good time, goot Saturday in all. Not counting how it ended but shit happens so let's just shut it.

Head is telling me to give up completely. 
Heart is telling me to just shut down completely.
I think it is one of those days where I wished my life is simple and not complicated as fuck and I don't have like 999 shit to think about and the other bitches ain't got one.

I shall go seek some refuge and solace in Death Cab For Cutie and remind myself how the heart is an empty room and someday I will be loved and then I will follow you into dark.

Till then my babies, stay gold and let sparks fly.

its either I lack sleep or I slept too much.

I feel damn lethargic now after crashing at some ungodly hour looking for hotels/inns/villas for 2 night stay at Bali under $100per night AND waiting for her to call me which eventually led me to falling asleep on my bed with two techtocks - bb's lapster and Aury, my Samsung phone right beside my ear. Thus, when the alarm rang this morning at 6am, I got the supriseshock of my life - my soul might have got jolted out of my body for a second or two.

But for now, since Suria is showing some annoying show and the peepos are not here, I might just go catch another 40 winks before the long long night arrives.

Salam eid adha to all the muslims out there.

/needs meh chickeen rendang!

I agree with you Taytay!

Well, it is love that makes life worthwhile and exciting and we do bother to make our life worth living. What's life without love right? ;)

Clownie dropped by after work today and surprised me with flowers. When she saw me, she said something along the lines of since we won't be meeting anytime that soon, she had to pass the flowers to me today. So damn sweet, I am dying of sweetness from Clownie. Clownie accompanied me to have dinner for before going off to meet her friend. Really missed my Clownie and was glad to see her. (:

Clownie noticed my MSN nick and started talking about it. Aha, I will tell you that I am a huge fan of Taylor Swift and I love her songs. Her current hit, Mine is practically on repeat mode for me. The song kinda strike some chord in me especially with that line "wondering why we bother about love if it never lasts". Hmmm, I guess more so with what happened lately especially in the affairs of the dear heart. Of course Clownie doesn't know that the line is from the song Mine which actually kinda sum up things about Clownie.



Me and the orange daisies from Clownie.

Heee, thanks Clownie, you are the best thing that's ever been mine. (:

Top of my list:

Not being able to express fully what your heart wants to say, like really really want to say.

One of them - how much you love that significant half of yours.

I feel so empty now because my head keeps controlling what my heart wants to say to her and for the longest time, I have not told her how much I love her and how beautiful she is.

I am going to eat curry puff now for whatever reasons.

This feeling sucks and Monday will be here soon, worseeee. :(

"You are my greatest failure."

Well, it makes sense now like more than ever why I am your greatest failure, ever.

1. I fill your life with dilemma and guilt.
2. I make your old wounds come alive and then leave you alone to cope with the raw feeling of looking at them unstitching slowly one by one baring it all open.
3. I can't even give you proper directions let alone instructions.

Hur, seriously, I beat all the epic failures you have probably made.

So wrecked, so wretched.

I would like to disappear.
Thanks.

And Arnold, it is even worse when the other party loves you as much as you love them.
Pure misery, words cannot describe how much it hurts boy.
 
Weather forecast today:
As at 9am, Singapore is pouring. My eyes are horribly wet as well and not to mention sore. As for the whole day, it will be one dark and very sad day.

Weather is expected to be wet wet wet in Singapore. That is clearly of no relevant to what my title is talking about.

I want a trip to Phuket.

Sand.
Sun.
Sea.
The beach.
The pretty beach.
The clear waters.
The idyllic surroundings.

After much talking,
I just want a break.

Thanks.

Unintended - Muse



Yeap, you could be my unintended.

This song was the only song that kept me sane during the darkest times of my life. The experience of living through the darkest yet sodding sad period of my life and emerged from it beaming with happiness was something I could very well identify with this song. Ah, it was love, unintended love.

Now, when I listen to this song, I feel a wave of helplessness. Ironic. It was this song that pulled me away and out from sinking deeper into the abyss of sadness. However, at this very moment, I feel like I am being reeled in deeper and further inside this dark and depressing hole to nowhere by an unseen force. Or, there are moments where I feel like I am in a trance like mode and I am floating aimlessly towwards it. Scary? You tell me.

But, I guess this is happening because "you could be my unintended" is not happening this time round which is also probably explains why the once "trick" backfired

Right, so when it backfires, I have to scurry around and find a new way to get out or at least try to not suddenly go into trance like mode and without realising float into the hole. So, I try my usual hair therapy in hopes of feeling better, well if not slightly should suffice, for the night. Hahaha!

Steven wasn't around thus Adam took over my hair today. Adam was perplexed and I must say rather amused when he found out why I was back in Twister this evening. Well, he did try to give me some words of comfort in the most blatant-deal-with-it way whilst he painstakingly showered my hair with love and patience. In his words, "shit happens right? life goes on."

Indeed so and so did a few inches of my hair. I got him to trim the ends of my utterly damaged poor hair which I believe hot only has accumulated all the disappointment and heartache for the past months (especially past one month) but also all the rubbish chemicals I have been lathering my hair with.

I look like this now...

Pardon moi. My vainity and hiao-ness plus all the consciousness made me wore my wayfarers in the room despite it being at night time but *coughs coughs* sometimes a pair of red eyes is better not to be seen.

I honestly wish I have a hair stylist at my beck and call each morning before I make my way to work to just maintain my hair at its top mad gorgeousness. Don't I look decently awesome with my right-after-saloon-hair? I bet tomorrow it will look horribly ugly again.

With that, I end this entry with a liner from the song in this post.

"You could be the one who listens to my deepest inquisitions."

Guten nacht babies!

Despite being down with a tummy upset which later escalated to fever yesterday, I managed to feel better overnight and proceeded on with my breakfast date with Adele at Dempsey. We went to Jones the Grocer. :D Hahaha, like finally.

We were supposed to meet for Mambo Night I know but we have decided to be normal people for once and not meet over dancing to glorified old hits. HAHAHAHA. But, I am sure we will do it soon. :p

Breakfast was good, so good in fact. I love Jones the Grocer, I really adore the place. The food is a little pricey but well, once in a while shouldn't hurt the pocket so much. All good things after all should have them moderately. Seesh. Totally dig the environment there and being surrounded with fresh grocery while enjoying my breakfast. I could totally make use of the items there and go for my unusual floating down the isles of fresh groceries.

So anyways, it was a good catch up and fill me in with your life time for the both of us since we have been away from each other for years, months, weeks and days. We obviously had tonnes to talk about and we could jolly well write a biography of our lives for each other to read. Adele let me into her school life, juicy bits of her personal life which I ain't gonna say about it here but I think I should just fly to overseas to like get away from it all and restart my life - all aspect of my life there. Gosh, the escapist in me sure like the thought of it.

We had our all time heart to heart talk and I really missed that. Adele is prolly one of the few people who I know I can have a truly honest heart to heart talk to the point that I usually shed a tear or two either in frustration or disappointment or anger in between or at the end. I think this time round it was like all 3 of the above. I was telling her how frustrated and pressurised I am lately because someone been telling/asking me to find a boyfriend? Like "when are you going to get a boyfriend?" I was like telling Adele...

"babe, if only finding a boyfriend is like taking a stroll down these isles of fresh groceries and I pick one that looks good, tastes good and well, good overall. But, what the hell? Life don't work out that way and so is my heart. Urgh. /bangs the table in frustration."

I think Adele got a shock when I banged the table and then I started tearing up. Emotional basket queen to the max lah but you know I think with yesterday's fever and diarhhea and then talking about matters of the heart, my emotions do get haywire a bit.

And with Adele being Adele, she totally made things right with her wise words and reassurance that things will turn better eventually. Oh, it also helps that we shared a delish cup of tea. Hahaha!

Well, Adele said almost the same thing what someone told me over the phone yesterday. She said no point rushing to find a boyfriend or a replacement to fill in the sudden hole/gap in the heart more so when the heart is not ready yet. It is because I will end up with tonnes and tonnes of rebound relationships and more shit and heartache will follow suit. I honestly think I was just being plain lucky that the supposed rebound relationship I had with J turned out pretty well but I can't say the same for the rest. Hur. Oh, Adele told me not to feel pressurised already because it is pointless. There is nothing much I can do if the heart is not ready for a new one. Yeah sure, options are kept open but when the time and the next one comes and the heart is ready, of course... the hole/gap is ready to be filled in but till then, such things shouldn't be rushed. Like they say, matters of the hearts should never be rushed even if sometimes, my head often tries to tell me... if only, your heart can move onto someone new in 24 hours time or I sooo cannot wait to get over this failed relationship and start anew.

I had a really good breakfast and I think my heart doesn't feel that heavy now. My heart feels free in fact, totally unchained from the frustration and pressure it has been going through lately to move on and find someone new. Yippeee yay! :)

Alright, enjoy the rest of the weekend babies! stay gold and awesome!
you make my heart move, you make it swing. (:

Mmmmm, what can I say? No matter what you do to yourself, outrageous or near drastic change, you still look beautiful to me. You certainly live up to the meaning of your name. Nice seeing you last night, lifted me up after a hard day's at work and just going through the day. Aha, gosh. Life's constant battle - making through the day. How pessimistic.

it is 6 am now, woke up to thoughts of you and how much I adore you, my addicthief.

xxx
A.

Ackk. One of those mornings where I wake up to a love-hate favourite scene from a movie and the stupid scene keeps ringing in my head like an annoying spoilt record player.

Not a good start to the Monday but let's look on the bright side, things will get better, eventually and slowly.

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5m2T5yfgsZ0



----

The head is being an ass, it keeps telling me how to emote and how my heart or I should be feeling. I am not enjoying this. :(

k, stay gold and have a good week ahead babies.
Ackkk, fuck the emotional post. Let's end the Sunday with the favourite korean girls,

Fighting a migraine with a heartache is almost as good as fighting a war with no ammo and support from the people you love.

Let's hope I wake up alive tomorrow, all ready and recharged and recovered to fight another war.


Till then,
stay gold babies.

ps: naaah ah, not crying for your sympathy or "awwwww". I am just doing myself a kind favour to not pent things inside and one day blow up and go crazy. Those awful days are long gone, ain't putting myself through such torture.

All thanks or no thanks to my dear Wenhui, I am back listening to ballads from 2AM (although I shouldn't be complaining because the songs really suit my mood and whatever that is going on inside my heart now.) and occassional, bawling out because of the words in the songs.

/stabs


happy saturday y'all!

"Eh woman, Mambo Night? Don't you miss those nights of pure fooling around while listening to old glorified hits? Hahaha! I am back till in EOY. So pleaseeeee, we need to go back to those nights again and have some great fun. Please don't SMLJ Zouk Mambo Night me. Thanks. xxx"

Yes Adele, I heard you. We will plan for a night at Zouk for our Mambo-escapade.


But for now, Hello Movida and yes yes, soon soon 1-Altitude with the PN peeps! Woot woot!

My life is complicated, filled with twist and turns and a hell lot of complications.

One incessant fear I always have that should anything happen to me, the person I love will never know how much I love her.

Having gone through multiple times of collapsing on the floor and my heart goes thump a pump a pump x120 beats per minute, I do try to make it a point to tell her

"hey, I love you."

everyday if it is possible or if I would love to every time when her messages come in or before I head to sleep.

Today's episode of Bones reiterated my fear of losing my memory and losing the chance to tell someone I love how much I love them. Losing memory for a day is no joke. Face blindness taught me that and face blindness is just not able to recognise people, I can't imagine how painful it will be not to be able to remember my he(a)rt, my love and of course, plus the rest of my loved ones.

While your fear and you dread the day where this heart will stop beating for you, my fear, my love is one day things happen and I didn't get a chance to say I love you to you and let you know how thankful I am to have you in my life and in my heart. And of course, having to start this life all over again with memories of you and me being erased and I may not have you in my life again.

That, my love is something I never got the guts to tell you right before you.

I logged onto Skype when I got home and to my surprise, J was online. We have not spoken to each other for about a while now. J's been really busy lately with getting used to her life in HK. And as for me, I barely go online - MSN/Yahoo IM/Skype these days. It is either I am plain lazy or I just don't feel like going online.

We spoke about life, we spoke about love and we spoke about hearts. It got awkward at some point of time and I think J sensed the sudden pauses and gulps from me.

J asked me about my heart and he(a)rt. J seems relieved that I didn't give up on love. According to J,

"well, not yet and you should never give up on love. As for your he(a)rt, don't give her up just yet. Just be there for her even if she disappears, runs and pushes you away. Be there, be still and when she falls, catch her and don't let her go. Don't even let her get hurt. Remember, never give up on someone who you think of everyday."

J's words totally warmed my heart, reminded me of how J taught me to love again when we were together.

Thanks J, you will always be the favourite one. :)

Lovesy Thursday it has been. Wished you are here with me he(a)rt especially in this cold weather. There is no place I'd rather be other than in your arms, close to you.

It was a wet morning, skies were grey and moods were down. I was sleepy, tired and not to mention still unwell. I was just trying to catch a little power nap when this song was playing on my phone.
 

"All You Wanted"

I wanted to be like you
I wanted everything
So I tried to be like you
And I got swept away

I didn't know that it was so cold
And you needed someone
to show you the way
So I took your hand and we figured out

I'd take you away

I can save you
I can take you away from here

was somebody who cares

I'm sinking slowly
So hurry hold me
Your hand is all I have to keep me hanging on
Please can you tell me
So I can finally see
Where you go when you're gone

If you want to
I can save you
I can take you away from here
So lonely inside
So busy out there
And all you wanted
was somebody who cares

All you wanted was somebody who cares
If you need me you know I'll be there
Oh, yeah

[x2]
If you want to
I can save you
I can take you away from here
So lonely inside
So busy out there

was somebody who cares

Please can you tell me
So I can finally see
Where you go when you're gone

Now, now, my dears, isn't this what we all wanted at some point of time?

Sometimes, I think it is almost the story of my life be it as someone who appears to be so busy out there yet so lonely inside or the one who would want to save the miserably lonely soul and take him or her away and care for them as much as I can.

Weird and wet Thursday morning.

Looooooooooooooooooooooong day ahead, someone should start saving me now. HAHAHAHA.

K, stay gold babies.

"You make me shudder, oooh yeah
I can't believe it, I'm not myself, suddenly I'm thinkin' of no one else
You make me shudder
Ohh I really need to know
Or else you gotta let me go

It's an impossible world
All I want is to be with you always
I give you everything
Pay some attention to me
All I want is just you and me always
Give me affection
I need your perfection
You feel so good
You make me stutter, stutter"

- Stutter, Maroon 5

I was just thinking about it. We were walking home and he(a)rt took my hands. Suddenly, he(a)rt asked me...

"why is your hand shaking?"

I didn't realise that my hand was shaking or trembling but I knew it trembles sometimes. Hahaha, maybe just like that fantasy girl Adam Levine is singing in Stutter, my he(a)rt makes me tremble not in fear but in awe how a fine person she is and yeah... "All I want is just you and me always." (:

xxx
thinking of you my he(a)rt <3

I have always loved walking with you even at the darkest alleys and at the latest hour of the night. You make me feel safe. Whenever I start fearing for my life, for some reason, I know where I can find your hands for me to hold onto. Thanks for holding on. Thanks for not letting go.

Last two evenings was just great. Thanks for being there. (:

I feel horribs mad ugly.
I am very tired.
I am hungry for some good affection or simply, TLC.
I want a good hug.
I want a good massage.
I want a nice simple dinner, too many events going on with so many good food, I am tired of those. I just want normal hawker fare for dinner today.

I know you are reading and these are the things I honestly cannot tell you directly for some weird mad reason or so.

So, if I appear really annoying later and may cause you to be angry and very fan-annoyed, I am sorry. :(

Tonight and the next how many nights, you and I know, we will be sleeping with a broken heart.
Tonight and the next how many nights, you and I know, we will try to find a way to make it without each other.
But, definitely tonight and the next how many nights, you and I know, we will be sleeping with a broken heart and tears filling up our eyes.

I didn't say them to you tonight because I don't know how it would fit in the equation in our current situation.

He(a)rt, I love you.

Yours,
A.

Day 5.

I was walking home from work earlier and I looked up to the sky and I was greeted with a crescent moon shining so brightly at me. I felt warm yet a sudden rush of emptiness appeared. Something was definitely missing. 

It wasn't something, it was someone.

It was you.

My moon, my he(a)rt, when I saw the crescent moon shining at me, I remember the times when we walked home together, you beside me. It felt so complete. I miss those times, I miss those nights, I miss being close to you, I miss walking side by side with you, I miss you.

My moon, my one and only moon.

Yes, the new I Touch 4 from Apple. :D
I am gna get it for myselfffffffffffffffffffffff for Christmas, to pamper myself cos' I so deserve it!
I am kinda torn whether I should get 8GB or 32GB.

I think the new ITouch is damn chiooo!
I haven't seen it yet at the Apple stores, they kept saying... it will arrive in a week's time but when I return a week later... still not there!
(you know, I am liking this ITouch cos' of the camera function :P yeah, can skype also provided I am at a wifi place!)

Now, I can't wait for December to come!
Zoukout 2010, Itouch 4, Christmas, dinners with my people and I guess... soon enough, I can talk to you.

Maybe I will end up like the chap in Maroon 5's song, Misery, who wrote 200 letters and none of them were sent to you because I am so afraid anything from me will just make things worse and bring more pain to you.

Day 3,

I lost all control yesterday and I needed you then which was why I picked up the phone and sent you a message. As for today, it is 10/10/10. 1 love/1 love/1 love. I want you to know today is the day to love and be loved. The very day I want you to know I love and miss you so.

Yours, faithfully,  forever and always,
A.

1he(a)rt.

in my heart, always.

Yours, faithfully, forever and always,
